attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to remove humps in roads - so called 'speed humps'  because they do not help to reduce speeding- they only help to wreck peoples' cars, especially the exhausts...no matter what speed one does....these are just inverted 'potholes' and do as much damage

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
